pageDesc.title: MP's Official Website
pageDesc.description: Welcome to my website. Here you can see all the projects I've worked on, some information about me, how to contact me and my blog in which I post updates about my projects. Enjoy your stay!

projects.title: MP's Website
projects.shortDesc: This here very website. What else can I say?
projects.description: This website is my personal website. I use it to display the things I've worked on and my blog which contain updates on my upcoming projects. The website is made using Vue.js for the client and is deployed using Firebase, which allows for dynamic content such as the blog.

projects.title: Big Chungus Bot
projects.shortDesc: A Big Chungus themed Discord bot, need I say more?
projects.description: Big Chungus Bot is a API application for Discord build with Discord.js, Typescript and MongoDB. He's a general purpose Discord bot that can give users custom colors, roll dice and much more. You can check him out on Github or try him out to find out more.

basicInfo.title: Basic Information
basicInfo.name: MentoskaPraha
basicInfo.description: I'm an amateur programmer and average gamer. I almost always work on websites or API applications, but I do occasionally work on games not related to the web in any way. I like to play video games with my friends and we most commonly play games like Sea of Thieves or Satisfactory.

entries.title: Github
entries.description: My Github page. Here you can see all my repos.

entries.title: Discord
entries.description: If you want to contact me via Discord, join this server.

entries.title: Coming Soon!
entries.description: This social media account is still in the works.

tech.title: VS-Code
tech.description: Visual Studio Code is a light weight Integrated Development Environment, which I use to write my all of my code.

tech.title: Github
tech.description: Github is a source control tool, which is an extension of Git. I use this to ensure my code is up to date everywhere.

tech.title: Firebase
tech.description: Firebase is a cloud service from Google that allows for hosting serverless apps. I use it to deploy my projects.

tech.title: Node.js
tech.description: Node.js is a back-end runtime used to execute Javascript on a server. I use this for apps like the Big Chungus Bot.

tech.title: Typescript
tech.description: Typescript is a Javascript addon that adds type safety to Javascript. I always use this as it's better Javascript.

tech.title: Vue.js
tech.description: Vue.js is a framework used for making websites or UIs. I used this framework to create this website.

tech.title: Tailwind CSS
tech.description: Tailwind CSS is a CSS utility for making website styling easier by adding tools to aid the dev-team.

tech.title: MongoDB
tech.description: MongoDB is a document based database used to store user data. I use MongoDB for Big Chungus Bot.
